Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth

Class SASLUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth.SASLUtils
  • public final class SASLUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for SASL authentication mechanisms. Provides cryptographic helpers shared across POP3, IMAP, and SMTP.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

        Parameters:
        nonce - the combined client+server nonce
        salt - the salt (Base64-encoded)
        iterations - the iteration count
        Returns:
        the server-first-message

      • computeCramMD5Response

        public static java.lang.String computeCramMD5Response​(java.lang.String password,
                                                      java.lang.String challenge)
        Computes the expected CRAM-MD5 response.
        Parameters:
        password - the user's password
        challenge - the server's challenge
        Returns:
        the expected HMAC-MD5 digest as hex

      • verifyCramMD5

        public static boolean verifyCramMD5​(java.lang.String response,
                                    java.lang.String challenge,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        Verifies a CRAM-MD5 response.
        Parameters:
        response - the response in format "username digest"
        challenge - the original challenge
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        true if the response is valid

      • parseDigestParams

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parseDigestParams​(java.lang.String response)
        Parses DIGEST-MD5 response parameters.
        Parameters:
        response - the response string
        Returns:
        map of parameter names to values

      • computeDigestHA1

        public static java.lang.String computeDigestHA1​(java.lang.String username,
                                                java.lang.String realm,
                                                java.lang.String password)
        Computes DIGEST-MD5 HA1 value.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        realm - the authentication realm
        password - the password
        Returns:
        hex-encoded HA1

      • parsePlainCredentials

        public static java.lang.String[] parsePlainCredentials​(byte[] credentials)
        Parses PLAIN credentials. Format: authzid NUL authcid NUL password
        Parameters:
        credentials - Base64-decoded credentials
        Returns:
        array of [authzid, authcid, password], authzid may be empty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if format is invalid

      • parseOAuthBearerCredentials

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parseOAuthBearerCredentials​(java.lang.String credentials)
        Parses OAUTHBEARER credentials. Format: n,a=user@example.com,^Aauth=Bearer token^A^A
        Parameters:
        credentials - Base64-decoded credentials
        Returns:
        map with "user" and "token" keys
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if format is invalid
